title: Highland Thunder
description: ★★★★★ "My favorite hero ever!" ~ Tareef, Kindle Customer★★★★★ "Love love love love this book. It was awesome!" ~ Tonya L., Kindle Customer★★★★★ "Loved it and can't wait to read book 3!" ~ Alivia L., Kindle CustomerA STORM IS COMING...Although she faces the tragic loss of her husband, Brenna will never succumb to fear or grief, nor will she surrender to the one man she despises - the very man who now has the power to control her destiny. Like the storms that rage unchecked over the moors, her fury is about to be unleashed.A HIDDEN LOVE...He does not look at her, or speak to her, and most importantly, he does not touch her. These are the rules Duncan set for himself long ago to ensure his affection for his best friend's wife remained undetected. But under the weight of a land besieged by war, the walls he erected to shield his heart crumble.If he can earn her trust, the one woman he has always loved may at last be his. But first, he must save what he cherishes most from a nightmare of dark secrets.
author: Lily Baldwin
